MemoryInfobox.location: Leader House, Boeotia|Leader House, Kadmeia, Thebes, Boeotia

General_Description: '''Stadium Love''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''To celebrate their win, champions escort their lovers from the stadium east of [[Thebes, Greece|Thebes]] to a bridge a overlooking a lake shaped like a heart. You can find me beside a [[helmet]] that was left behind.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving at the middle of Thebes East bridge, just south of the heart-shaped lake.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
